ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] The old man here
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, 4/1/99... I waited until a month after the beta was over because there were so many problems I didn t see it as worth messing with in March 1999 :)p The
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, 4/1/99... I waited until a month after the beta
was over because there were so many problems I didn't
see it as worth messing with in March 1999 :)p

The fun thing about such a complicated play universe
is that there are so many ways to go about things, and
so many valid opinions. Not one *right* one.

Quwi
--- tsetse68 <jpvoits@...> wrote:
> Hi all,
> As I have read the boards over the last couple of
> weeks, I can't
> help but get the feeling that I am the old man of
> this group. I have
> been playing EQ since the beginning, and have a vast
> knowledge of the
> game. I current have 3 characters, a 65 Ranger, a 48
> Necro, and a 44
> Rogue. I have, however, played every class into the
> 30's, just to get
> a feel for how each class works. Please feel free to
> ask me any
> questions =) I check the boards once every three
> days, and will try
> to answer any questions I can =)
>
> Rhemy DeMortis
> 65 Forest Stalker of Tunare
> Officer and Proud member of Haven's Promise
> Mith Marr server
>
>
